I provide my napkin math $NVDA valuation in my subscriber area.

This was roughly our bull case 1-year target until NVIDIA’s monster beat and raise.

While many other armchair analysts are in hiding because “stonk went down,” we will not let stonk price drive our valuations.

In Case You Missed It
@TrungTPhan

Nvidia was founded at a Denny’s restaurant in 1993 and went public in 1999.

At Nvidia’s IPO, a $1000 investment into:

• Denny’s (DENN) now worth $1,700
• Nvidia (NVDA) now worth $2,000,000

Lesson: Growth always beats value.
